about_the_game:
OUTCLAW is a third-person action-adventure game about minions, monsters and mayhem. Play as Giblet, a mischievous, mystical and magical feline cast from their home and seeking revenge.

On your adventures discover Giblet's unnatural powers and ability to control minions! Order them about to nibble ankles and turn into weird and wacky shapes to assist solving puzzles or liberating critters from the evil parliament of owls; who knows what wonderful people may join you on your journey?



Shades!

Gather shades, mischievous little creatures that will help you on your journey. Command them, fight alongside them, or just hang out with these charming little devils. As you go on adventures, maybe they could learn a new trick or two?



Explore!

As you navigate the wonderous worlds, you’ll come across all kinds of creatures. Some might be friendly, others less so. From magical floating eyeballs to academic owl lawyers, you are sure to run into a colourful cast of characters at every turn.



Mayhem!

Leave chaos in your wake as you fight, explore and solve puzzles. Break things, jump around, and revel in the kind of carnage only you can create. As you smash your way through the various worlds of Outclaw, you'll go from breaking crystals to toppling pillars, all the while building up an army that will eventually challenge the very gods themselves.

name: OUTCLAW

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTC 970 or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: OUTCLAW is a third person action adventure about commanding minions. Solve puzzles and fight monsters alongside your underlings, discovering all the peculiar forms they can take. Explore a variety of wonderous worlds in this exciting adventure full of mischief, monsters, minions and mayhem!
